Entries.spring_1: I guess spring is pretty cool.$0#$b#It's nice and warm and has tons of flowers and...stuff...$3
Entries.spring_2: It would be so cool if I could go to space...$3#$b#Sorry, just thinking out loud.$0
Entries.spring_3: You explore mines, don't you?$0#$b#You should bring me along sometime.$0
Entries.spring_5: I wonder what I should cook today.$3#$b#Got any ideas?$0
Entries.spring_6: You know what I could go for right now?$0#$b#A tasty burger with a side of fries.$1
Entries.spring_7: If you ever need a gift for Puka, he really loves pearls.$0
Entries.spring_8: I hope there are shooting stars out tonight.$0#$b#I don't need to make any wishes, but I enjoy watching them.$0
Entries.spring_9: Do you ever use a sword?$3#$b#It feels really cool to use one, doesn't it?$1
Entries.spring_10: I wish more of the other axolotls were into sports.$3#$b#It gets kinda boring playing by myself, you know?$3
Entries.spring_11: I think I'm gonna go diving later.$0#$b#I'll bring you back a deep-sea souvenir, okay?$1
Entries.spring_12: Since I'm an axolotl, my limbs should be able to grow back if I lose them, right?$3#$b#I've never actually tested that out.$3
Entries.spring_13: Do you think Puka would like blue lilies?$3#$b#Just wondering.$3
Entries.spring_14: You have a lot of experience exploring around, right?$3#$b#Feel free to tell me any cool stories you have.$0
Entries.spring_17: You know what I could go for right now?$0#$b#A tasty burger with a side of fries.$1
Entries.spring_18: Puka is always looking after the Littles.$0#$b#I'm sure they appreciate him a lot.$1
Entries.spring_19: You explore mines, don't you?$0#$b#You should bring me along sometime.$0
Entries.spring_20: Do you ever use a sword?$3#$b#It feels really cool to use one, doesn't it?$1
Entries.spring_22: I hope there are shooting stars out tonight.$0#$b#I don't need to make any wishes, but I enjoy watching them.$0
Entries.spring_23: Lala and Lulu do some amazing stunt work during their circus performances.$0#$b#I almost wish I could join them sometimes!$1
Entries.spring_24: It would be so cool if I could go to space...$3#$b#Sorry, just thinking out loud.$0
Entries.spring_25: You explore mines, don't you?$0#$b#You should bring me along sometime.$0

Entries.spring_27: I wonder what I should cook today.$3#$b#Got any ideas?$0
Entries.spring_28: I'm excited for summer to start.$0#$b#It's just such an energizing season, you know?$1
Entries.summer_1: Summer, summer, summer!$1#$b#Time for beach fun everyday!$1
Entries.summer_2: @!$0#$b#Wanna stargaze with Puka and I later?$0
Entries.summer_3: I think I'm gonna go diving later.$0#$b#I'll bring you back a deep-sea souvenir, okay?$1
Entries.summer_4: If you ever need a gift for Puka, he really loves pearls.$0
Entries.summer_6: I think I might set up a campfire tonight.$0#$b#If you show up, we could make some s'mores together!$1
Entries.summer_7: Happy Tanabata!$1#$b#If you decide to make a wish, I hope it comes true.$0
Entries.summer_8: Lulu says that both Lala and I are way too energetic.$3#$b#But I think being high-energy is a good thing!$0
Entries.summer_11: I wish we had a boat shop that sold weapons.$0#$b#Like swords and stuff.$0#$b#That would be pretty cool.
Entries.summer_12: You have a lot of experience exploring around, right?$3#$b#Feel free to tell me any cool stories you have.$0
Entries.summer_13: If you ever lose Puka, just head to the lake.$0#$b#9 times out of 10, he'll be there.$0
Entries.summer_14: Hey, let's play some beach volleyball!$1
Entries.summer_15: Lala and Lulu do some amazing stunt work during their circus performances.$0#$b#I almost wish I could join them sometimes!$1
Entries.summer_16: It may be hotter cuz it's summer, but I never really notice.$0#$b#The heat doesn't affect me much.$0
Entries.summer_17: Puka's birthday is tomorrow.$0#$b#Are you gonna get him a present?$0
Entries.summer_18: It's Puka's birthday today!$1#$b#Where would I be without him by my side?$0
Entries.summer_19: I hope there are shooting stars out tonight.$0#$b#I don't need to make any wishes, but I enjoy watching them.$0
Entries.summer_20: So, is shrimp fried rice actually fried by shrimp?$3
Entries.summer_21: I'm surprised we don't have a library here.$3#$b#Maybe in the future, though!$0
Entries.summer_22: It would be so cool if I could go to space...$3#$b#Sorry, just thinking out loud.$0
Entries.summer_24: I wonder what I should cook today.$3#$b#Got any ideas?$0
Entries.summer_25: It's nearing the end of summer.$3#$b#I'm sure Puka is sad about that.$2
Entries.summer_26: Hey, let's play some beach volleyball!$1
Entries.summer_27: Those two ice cream guys are always arguing over who makes better ice cream.$3#$b#It's a bit funny.$0
Entries.summer_28: It's sad that summer is pretty much over, but I do also like fall.$0
Entries.fall_1: I love the red, orange and yellow leaves that come with fall.$0#$b#So cool.$0
Entries.fall_2: I'm feeling in the mood to go on an epic adventure!$1
Entries.fall_3: I think I'm gonna go diving later.$0#$b#I'll bring you back a deep-sea souvenir, okay?$1

Entries.fall_5: You know what I could go for right now?$0#$b#A tasty burger with a side of fries.$1
Entries.fall_6: Fall is a nice season for just sitting down and enjoying the nature.$0
Entries.fall_7: Do people eat axolotls?$3#$b#That's kind of horrifying to think about.$3
Entries.fall_8: I wish more of the other axolotls were into sports.$3#$b#It gets kinda boring playing by myself, you know?$3

Entries.fall_12: If you ever need a gift for Puka, he really loves pearls.$0
Entries.fall_13: Because it's the season of Halloween, there are often skeleton decorations around.$3#$b#...But to tell you the truth, I don't really like skeletons.$3
Entries.fall_14: Puka is always looking after the Littles.$0#$b#I'm sure they appreciate him a lot.$1
Entries.fall_16: Kin didn't leave his home much when he was here, but he always came out during the fall.$0#$b#He really loved this season.$0
Entries.fall_17: I wonder if pumpkin burgers are a thing...$3
Entries.fall_18: Are you someone who finds spiders scary?$3#$b#I think they're kinda cool.$0
Entries.fall_19: I would whip up some pumpkin pie to eat, but I feel like Nimue would be able to sniff it out all the way from the lake and come and snatch it.$3
Entries.fall_20: I think I'm gonna go diving later.$0#$b#I'll bring you back a deep-sea souvenir, okay?$1
Entries.fall_21: I wonder if our little village will continue to grow in size.$0#$b#I sure hope so!$1
Entries.fall_22: What's my favorite food?$3#$b#Hmmm....$3#$b#Don't tell Puka this, but it's not fish.$3

Entries.fall_24: My birthday is tomorrow.$0#$b#But don't feel like you have to get me anything!$3#$b#You just wishing me a happy birthday is fine enough.$0

Entries.fall_26: It would be so cool if I could go to space...$3#$b#Sorry, just thinking out loud.$0

Entries.winter_3: It might be too cold out for me to go deep-sea diving.$3
Entries.winter_4: Hope you said happy birthday to Lala and Lulu!$0
Entries.winter_5: How's your farm holding up right now?$3
